{{Infobox Key Item |name = Safari Ticket |image = [[File:SafariTicket_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Safari Ticket''. |use = Allows entry to the [[Kanto]] Safari Zone |obtain = Clear the Fuchsia Gym in Kanto }} ===Description=== This ticket grants access to the [[Safari Zone]] in [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuschia City]] ===Acquisition=== Completing the [[Gyms#Kanto_Gyms|Fuschia Gym]] ===Effects=== You can now go to the [[Safari Zone]]

revision.comment: First draft with new image, infobox, and navbox
